summary: As a condition of their civilian employment, federal employees known as "dual-status technicians" are required to also maintain a military position. Their roles may include training or maintenance. Some are "nonpermanent," which means that they fill in for deployed personnel or are called in to support emerging needs. Officials told us their ability to hire nonpermanent technicians helps them quickly fill critical jobs and be...
title: Military Personnel: Actions Needed to Improve Workforce Data for Technicians Supporting Mission Readiness
